page.title: 01The area around Rivenhall
page.content: Our area includes a small country village and the outskirts of a town.It is a very rural area.The village is Rivenhall and its neighbouring town is Witham.Both are near a major road,the A12,which is a main road to London.In Rivenhall there is a Saxon Church standing on a site over 1000 years old.The area is surrounded by fields, woods and farmland. There are eleven farms and four schools in the area.Three of the schools are primary schools and one is a secondary school.There are eleven fairly small shops,two of which are general village stores. The outskirts of Witham comprises a newly built estate which houses many people who have moved out of the London area.
